ygData.subject: Re: Leatherskin reagent?
ygData.msgSnippet: bloodstone is the leatherskin component.  ive been killing things in lava that pass by lately. i would have someone else research it.  i burned a few
ygData.messageBody:
bloodstone is the leatherskin component. ive been killing things in lava
that pass by lately.

i would have someone else research it. i burned a few components on
harmshield a while back, and now i would rather get a higher lvl to do it
(if they keep up with research) if you want to do it yourself, i end up
using my practices on research. (thats actually the only thing i really used
them on, other than to start meditation. i think i have 83 =)

belphenor
